= Mechanical Auto-Sorter =

== University Project ==
 * http://ece.olin.edu/pe/projects/cardcataloger/
 * They used a PIC18 with built-in USB support for the project:
  * http://milan.milanovic.org/skola/parport/usbport-03.htm
  * http://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/DeviceDoc/39632e.pdf
 * They also used suction to pick up the cards
